survey_name: Sustainable Workplace Practices Employee Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on current sustainability practices in the workplace and identify areas for improvement to foster a greener office environment.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's current sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly dropdown for answer options.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's current sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices does your workplace currently implement? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Sustainable commuting incentives (e.g., bike racks, public transport subsidies)
